data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=FIZz9xFf6pwQ7kNvgGDP5NA&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDnZZebvjW0eF-twiEstYK4lcH3OY3PXe2Yk8J2v2xvHw&oe=669CEF37)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XUF1om_DcpoQ7kNvgGGlPiC&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBiwG2rVPVHPWc45zO0aHozpZyg_W3hXbsBzkPmBxXIUA&oe=669CFCD2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7QQ-LCas-H4Q7kNvgFY1QWQ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBhONU9IBMu3_6FPeltph2Bf3BJ0487lLZeTE-rsG-n7g&oe=669CE809)
